text:
RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. We’re exploring Windows Desktop LTSC via our Software Assurance grant that all of our clients have. [cid:image001.png@01DA0106.EA8A88B0] https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/evaluate-windows-10-enterprise
 Philip Elder MCTS Senior Technical Architect Microsoft High Availability MVP
 E-mail:  Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 Skype: MPECSInc. Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Monday thru Friday. %40MPECSInc.Ca
